Detailed Description

Volume functions.

Define Documentation

#define MARK_VOLUME_DELETE ( VOL   )     (VOL)->delete_p = true

Mark the volume to delete it.

#define VOLUME_ID_CONFIG   1

ID of 'config' volume

#define VOLUME_ID_VIRTUAL   0

Predefined volume IDs. ID of the non-existing 'root' volume

#define VOLUME_NO_LIMIT   0

Value of size limit indicating that the volume is not limited.

void volume_delete ( volume  vol  ) 

Destroy volume VOL and free memory associated with it. Destroy dentries while volume_mutex is unlocked. This function expects fh_mutex to be locked.
